quote: If you can survive in a down market, you're perfectly positioned to thrive when times are good.
why_clipworthy: Encourages resilience and long-term thinking in real estate.
suggested_hook: Why starting in a down market might be the best thing for your real estate career.

quote: If you think about someone, call them. Those personal touchpoints make all the difference.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of personal connections in client retention.
suggested_hook: The simple habit that keeps you top of mind with clients.
